Revenue Agency Practices

Complete solutions for all Revenue Agency practices

Home > Services > Revenue Agency Practices

Administrative practice agencies in Milan, including Acentro Services, offer various services related to the Revenue Agency. Acentro Services provides support for managing formalities and compliance with public administration entities.

Here is a detailed list of services offered:

Tax Management, Assessment, and Disputes

Verification of payment notices and tax bills to resolve tax issues.

VAT Number Assignment, Modification, or Termination

Complete support for opening, modifying, or closing a business VAT number.

Tax Code Assignment

Assistance in obtaining tax codes for individuals and legal entities.

Lease Contract Registration and Termination

Complete management of rental contract registration and termination practices.

Subsequent Years Payments and Extensions

Assistance with periodic payments and extensions related to registered contracts.

Acts/Minutes Registration

Support for registering acts and minutes with the Revenue Agency.

VAT and/or Double Taxation Certificates

Obtaining certifications related to VAT and double taxation.

Tax Compliance Certificates

Request and obtaining of certificates attesting taxpayer's tax compliance.

Tax Pending Charges Certificates

Assistance in obtaining certificates related to pending tax charges.

Revenue Agency Registrations and Changes

Support for registration and data change procedures at the Revenue Agency.

Contract Registration

Complete assistance for registering various types of contracts.

Dividend Distribution Minutes Registration

Support for registering corporate dividend distribution minutes.

Tax Data Change Reports

Assistance in submitting reports related to tax data changes.

Revenue Agency and Equitalia Pending Charges Certificates

Obtaining certifications related to pending charges at Revenue Agency and Equitalia.

Lease Contract and Online Renewal Schedule

Digital management of lease contracts with reminder system for renewals.

VAT Number Issuance

Complete assistance in obtaining VAT numbers for new businesses.

Related Digital Services

Acentro Services also offers digital services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), which are useful tools for simplifying operational processes related to communication with the Revenue Agency.

Electronic Invoicing

Additionally, we can provide assistance with electronic invoicing, which is mandatory for flat-rate taxpayers with revenues or fees exceeding €25,000 in 2021 and will be mandatory for all from 2024.

DIGIPRAM: The Management Software for Administrative Practices

Acentro Services provides DIGIPRAM, a management software designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers features such as integration with electronic invoicing and document management.

Need assistance with your Revenue Agency practices?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you simplify your tax compliance.

Request Information

Fast and efficient solutions for businesses and professionals since 1986.
